attributes.action: Treat people with the interest in modified cars the same as unmodified vehicles
attributes.background: Stop police assuming that modified car drivers are doing illegal activities and let us enjoy our hobby with out the threat of a fine or our vehicle being taken away.

rejection.details:
Policing is a matter for individual police forces, not the Government or House of Commons.

If you are unhappy with how the police have behaved you can find out how to complain about the police here: https://www.policeconduct.gov.uk/complaints-reviews-and-appeals/make-complaint
